cause.description:
Children all over the world have been working tireslessly to gain money for their families. Working conditions are harsh and unsafe to their bodies. Besides that, chilren do not get enough food or education. For this, WE ALL must STAND UP to end child cruelty in this world!
1. Education and human needs are EXTREMELY IMPORTANT!!!!!
2. Children have the right to find jobs that are safe and pay at the correct price
cause.name: End Child Labor
